views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9, 10, 11 and 12

Easy Dial with T9 Search Functionality. Developped on iPhone 7 iOS 11.3.1. It should work well on iOS 9+, which use CNContact framework. It is integrated with native phone.app with additional options in preference. It supports English and Mandarin Chinese.

Configure options from Settings.

fixed an internal logical issue. Verified on iPhone8 iOS12.4 1. tap bottom right Keypad TAB to activate T9 keypad to input.
2. long-press Keypad TAB to switch EasyDialer and native dialer.
3. support to add T9 Key character for Turkish/Russian.
4. Enhanced call history information.
5. Control searching numbers by '#'.
6. support arm64e A12/iOS12.
fix localization issue 1/2.


1. Support Russian Contacts; add organization field. Features donated by Сергей Инок.
2. Correct show-up of Chinese Contact.
3. Improve stability when launching http://Phone.app
4. Add Arabic localization. Thanks A7med.y.
